statements: SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE city_id = 1;
SELECT city_id, energy_reading FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE grid_status = 'Active';
SELECT city_id, timestamp, energy_reading FROM EnergyConsumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT AVG(energy_reading) AS avg_energy FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY city_id;
SELECT city_id, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_reading > 500 GROUP BY city_id;
SELECT * FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE city_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT city_id, energy_reading FROM EnergyConsumption WHERE energy_reading > 100 ORDER BY energy_reading DESC;
SELECT city_id, SUM(energy_reading) AS total_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY city_id HAVING total_energy_consumed > 500;
SELECT city_id, MAX(energy_reading) AS max_energy_consumed, MIN(energy_reading) AS min_energy_consumed FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY city_id;
SELECT grid_status, COUNT(city_id) AS city_count FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY grid_status HAVING city_count > 1 ORDER BY city_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT city_name, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE city_name = 'New York';
SELECT city_name, date, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT city_name, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT city_name, date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE city_name = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT city_name, date, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE city_name = 'New York' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY city_name;
SELECT city_name, AVG(energy_usage) AS avg_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY city_name;
SELECT e.city_name, e.date, e.energy_usage, w.temperature, w.humidity FROM energy_consumption e JOIN weather_data w ON e.city_name = w.city_name AND e.date = w.date;
SELECT city_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY city_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT city_id, energy_type, consumption_amount FROM energy_consumption_data;
SELECT * FROM city_weather_data WHERE humidity > 60;
SELECT city_id, temperature, humidity FROM city_weather_data ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT source_type, capacity, location FROM energy_sources WHERE capacity > 1000 ORDER BY source_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN city_weather_data USING(city_id);
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_data ORDER BY city_id DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT city_id, energy_type, SUM(consumption_amount) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption_data GROUP BY city_id, energy_type ORDER BY total_consumption DESC;
SELECT city_id, energy_type, consumption_amount FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE city_id = 3 AND timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY consumption_amount DESC;

SELECT city_id, energy_type, timestamp FROM energy_consumption_data JOIN city_weather_data ON energy_consumption_data.city_id = city_weather_data.city_id WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT city_id, source_type, capacity FROM energy_sources WHERE capacity > 1000 AND location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY source_id ASC;
SELECT city_name, region FROM city_info;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE city_id = 1;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensor_data WHERE city_id = 2 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT city_name, population FROM city_info WHERE region = 'North';
SELECT city_id, installation_date FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_name LIKE 'Temperature%';
SELECT city_id, timestamp, consumption FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY city_id DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT city_name, region, population FROM city_info WHERE region = 'West' ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensor_data WHERE city_id = 3 ORDER BY installation_date ASC;
SELECT source_type, capacity FROM energy_sources WHERE city_id = 5 AND source_type = 'Solar' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT city_id, SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY city_id ORDER BY total_consumption DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT city_name, consumption FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_type='Electricity';
SELECT city_name, SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY city_name;
SELECT building_name, city_name, building_type FROM buildings ORDER BY city_name ASC;
SELECT city_name, population, sustainability_rating FROM city_info WHERE population > 100000 ORDER BY sustainability_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT city_name, SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY city_name;
SELECT city_name, energy_type, SUM(consumption) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY city_name, energy_type;
SELECT e.city_name, e.energy_type, e.consumption, s.source_type, s.capacity FROM energy_consumption e INNER JOIN energy_sources s ON e.city_name = s.city_name;

SELECT b.building_name, b.building_type, em.energy_type, SUM(em.consumption) AS total_consumption FROM buildings b INNER JOIN energy_meter em ON b.id = em.building_id GROUP BY b.building_name, b.building_type, em.energy_type;
